keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Researchers began vaccinating volunteers in Sierra Leone on Monday with an experimental Ebola vaccine.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Sierra Leone: Ebola Trial Begins

snippet: Researchers began vaccinating volunteers in Sierra Leone on Monday with an experimental Ebola vaccine.
abstract: Researchers vaccinate volunteers in Sierra Leone with experimental Ebola vaccine, rVSV-EBOV, which showed promise in primate studies; scientists aim to enroll 6,000 health care workers in CDC sponsored trial.
